text:
@BBCNews One reason why African Americans may be more susceptible to contacting the coronavirus is: 

African Americans eat a lot of unhealthy foods (a legacy of slavery). 

Especially pork. The meat of pork already contains many parasites and viruses.

https://t.co/msMzBZCzN0
